Summary: Page indicators for CarouselView: show total items and current position.
Remarks: Pair IndicatorView with a CarouselView to visualize paging. Bind to the same items and place the IndicatorView near the CarouselView. Customize appearance with .IndicatorColor, .IndicatorSize, and .IndicatorsShape; use .SelectedIndex when you need to programmatically change or reflect the current position.
